spec_data.Name: claws-mail-plugins-acpi-notifier
spec_data.Description:
Enables mail notification via LEDs on some laptops. Options can be found on
the 'Plugins/Acpi Notifier' page of the preferences.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 17 Sep 2017 05:06:37 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: ACPI notification plugin for Claws Mail
